Posts.Content: allaky3, how did your biop go?? I have pain in both brests, mostly rt, thst was were "something" was seen on mamamo, rad said in report probably benign, sonogram said everything Ok, but I'm ganna try and get mri !! On one hand I'm 47 and perimenapausel, so if your cystic, which I'am I might be having some fibroadema's or sono showed the area to be a cyst. Jut want more confirmation, because it is sore, and I keep forgetting not to lift, keep me posted please.............Deniser in NY
Posts.Signature: "going thru these very rough times have made me WAKE UP, I know this sounds cliche, but don't want to go back to sleep" !!!
Posts.Title: Breast lump but negative test

Posts.Content: What your posting is really incrediable!! When your Momwas dx'd originally, 6 yrs ago, didn't they do a bone scan at that time?? I see on the community BC .org, most woman are sent for ct scans and bone scans? Also I would definately go to a teaching hospital, that has a wing just dedicated to BC!! Really cant stress that enough, please let us or me know what happens, I hope her Dr. is right. Is he an breast onc?? or a breast surgeon? Also Is he from large hospital? I'm not puttong down her Dr. and I really hope he is correct, however if it is rare and it sounds rare then Iw ould want to go were there is alot of BC traffic. with the best best intentions, Denise in NY
